Home Audio Sony WF-C700N TWS earbuds with noise cancellation launched globally, WH-1000XM5 headphones get...
  • News

Sony WF-C700N TWS earbuds with noise cancellation launched globally, WH-1000XM5 headphones get a new colour

Alongside the Sony WF-C700N TWS, the company has also launched the Midnight Blue variant of the WH-1000XM5.

By
Vivek Singh Chauhan
-
Published On: April 5, 2023 | Last Updated: April 5, 2023
Highlights
  • The Sony WF-C700N earbuds have been launched in four colour variants.
  • The Sony WF-C700N earbuds offers a comfortable and immersive sound.
  • Sony has launched the WH-1000XM5 in a new Midnight Blue colour.

Japanese tech giant Sony has launched the WF-C700N truly wireless earbuds that come with noise cancellation, adaptive sound control, and much more. Not just that, the company has also unveiled a new colour variant of the WH-1000XM5 headphones. It should be noted that both devices’ features were leaked online a few days ago. However, as they are now official, let us look at the features as well as the price of the newly launched audio products.

Show Full Article

Sony WF-C700N price, colours, features

The all-new Sony WF-C700N is launched at approximately EURO 119 (approx Rs 10,712) and comes in four colours, including Sage Green, Lavender, Black, and White.

The company said the Sony WF-C700N is small, lightweight, and offers a comfortable and immersive sound. The earbuds have an ergonomic surface design for a more secure fit and a shape that perfectly mimics the human ear, allowing you to listen for extended periods of time without taking a break. The cylindrical charging case is compact and simple to carry in a pocket or backpack. The case boasts a geometrically patterned material for a fashionable, opulent appearance.

The Sony WF-C700N comes with a noise-cancellation feature. Users can cancel out the background noise with noise cancellation or use the Ambient Sound Mode to remain connected to their natural surroundings.

Also Read

Sony WF-C700N buds design and features, new colour variant of flagship WH-1000XM5 headphones leaked

Sony WH-CH720N headphones with super-light body, active noise cancellation launched in India: price, features

Sony WF-1000XM5 flagship TWS earbuds launch imminent, live images leaked

The feedforward mics catch more ambient sound around you in Ambient Sound mode, allowing you to enjoy a natural listening experience while remaining connected to your surroundings. You can customise the app’s settings or use the Focus on Voice preset to chat without removing your earbuds.

The Sony WF-C700N also has Adaptive Sound Control, which changes ambient sound settings based on your location and activity. It recognises commonly visited locations and changes the sound modes to fit the situation. It comes with a battery life of up to 15 hours, IPX4 ratings and smart features, and it can be paired with two Bluetooth devices simultaneously.

Sony WH-1000XM5 unveiled in a new colour

The company has launched the Sony WH-1000XM5 in a new Midnight Blue colour, which is priced at approximately EURO 399 (approx Rs 35,907). It offers multiple microphones, a noise cancellation feature, Auto NC Optimiser, and more.
